content: i decided to use my amazing google skills to see if anyone had made the crocheted hat bella swan wears during the twilight movie s la push scene where she goes with her friends to the beach and learns about werewolves and vampires from jacob i can t say i was crazy about the hat but i remembered looking at it and thinking it looked simple enough to make and still pretty cool not all neat things need to be difficult since nobody had whipped one up yet i decided to create my own this afternoon there aren t any pictures of the original online so i m almost positive my version doesn t look exactly like bella s in twilight but it s probably close enough to satisfy our craving until i can get ahold of a real picture somewhere for comparison http //www jennlikesyarn com/blog/2008/11/bella-swan-la-push-hat-from-twilight html as always please let me know if there are any errors d
